com.bham.bd.components.triggers

Class Trigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.components.triggers.Trigger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtraInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dissolve, HitMarker, RespawnTrigger, RingExplosion

    public abstract class Trigger
extends BaseGameEntity
implements ExtraInfo
    Base class for a trigger. A trigger is an object that is activated when an entity moves within its region of influence.

      • handle

        public abstract void handle(BaseGameEntity entity)
        Handles intersection with BaseGameEntity

        Determines if the entity is within the trigger's region of influence. If it is then the trigger will be handle the action to be taken

        Parameters:
        entity - game entity on which the collision will be checked
